name: rovas-connector
description: VS Code extension modeled on the functionality of an existing JOSM plugin for Rovas Connector.

rovas-connector.apiKey.description: API key for Rovas integration. Find this on your Rovas profile page: https://rovas.app/user

rovas-connector.apiToken.description: API token for Rovas integration. Find this on your Rovas profile page: https://rovas.app/user

rovas-connector.projectId.description: Project ID (parent project for the created work reports). To manage your Project ID history, use the 'Rovas Connector: Manage Project IDs' command from the Command Palette.

rovas-connector.inactivityTimeout.description: Timer tolerance: lag in seconds after last edit to be counted as active time.

rovas-connector.paidStatus.description: I am not paid for my programming work by a company (only prompted to send a work report if this is confirmed).

rovas-connector.reportEvents.description: Events that trigger the Rovas work report dialog. Currently only 'onCommit' is supported.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
